name: Roots (Mauricio Camargo Santos, FrozenInkStudio)
description:
Roots is a clicker based on old school web clickers, designed to be chilling, yet addictive.

Help our little witch with some  potion crafting, where she has made a twist to the traditional recipes by using roots instead of fruits and leaves.

The game is played solely in the browser.

This is our entry for the Global Game Jam 2023.

Music taken from: YouTube library: Forest lullaby

Font taken from: Google fonts, Itim, Designed by Cadson Demak

Created by Frozen Ink Studio, Bogotá, Colombia
